thread.title: Legislation aimed at limiting public records lawsuits
thread.title_full: Legislation aimed at limiting public records lawsuits | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: John Kennedy and Jane Musgrave
title: Legislation aimed at limiting public records lawsuits
text:
Florida lawmakers are poised to make another attempt at limiting the lucrative industry of suing for public records — a tactic some public officials in Palm Beach County claim drives Gulf Stream resident Martin O’Boyle, who first burst on the scene flying blistering banners.
Sen. Wilton Simpson, R-Trilby, and Rep. Halsey Beshears, R-Monticello, said Wednesday they are filing a measure for next year’s Legislature aimed at taking on what they labeled “scammers” who use public record requests to reach financial settlements with cities and counties.
